definition: to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: Be that as it may， the nerve poison does its business with man far more quickly than the blood poison.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，神经毒液毒杀人类比血毒液快得多。

sentences.english: Methods of control involved poisoning and fumigation.
sentences.chinese: 防治的方法包括毒杀和熏蒸。

sentences.english: The hypothesis of poison was rejected due to lack of evidence.
sentences.chinese: 毒杀的假设因证据不足而不成立。

sentences.english: Of toxaphene in lake water and its uptake by aquatic plants and animals.
sentences.chinese: 毒杀芬湖中的水，其吸收的水生的植物和动物。

sentences.english: The toxicity and palatability of tested rodenticides was evaluated with killing rate and feed coefficient.
sentences.chinese: 以毒杀率和摄食系数评价各种药物的毒效和适口性。

sentences.english: She deliberately set out to poison her husband.
The Population poisoned from entering the digestive system, such as trichlorfon , and so on.
sentences.chinese: 经虫口进入其消化系统起毒杀作用，如敌百虫等。

sentences.english: Kill me with spites; yet we must not be fors.
sentences.chinese: 尽管毒杀我，我们可别相仇视。

sentences.english: Toxaphene, an organic chloride insecticide possesses a long residual period.
sentences.chinese: 毒杀芬为有机氯杀虫剂的一种，残效期长。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Louisa suffered another two poison plot, a fluke of danger.
sentences.chinese: 还，路易莎又遭遇两次毒杀阴谋，只是幸运出险。

sentences.english: The formation of inclusion bodies is morphologic evidence of viral cytocidal infection.
sentences.chinese: 包涵体形成是病毒杀细胞性感染的形态学证据。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo observe the effectiveness of Responsar against Anopheles sinensis and Anopheles anthropophagus.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察拜虫杀对中华按蚊和嗜人按蚊的毒杀效果。

sentences.english: At college she was accused of trying to poison two white students.
sentences.chinese: 在读书的时候，她被指控试图毒杀两位白人同学。

sentences.english: The rumor that Salieri had poisoned Mozart, however, likely originated from Salieri himself.
sentences.chinese: 关于萨列里毒杀莫扎特的传言极有可能是来自他自己。

sentences.english: Per square meter with 1 g of aluminum phosphide , the bugs have a stronger root toxicity.
sentences.chinese: 每平方米用磷化铝1克，对根蝽有较强的毒杀作用。

sentences.english: The dosing toxaphene mixture was found to be extensively metabolized.
sentences.chinese: 毒杀芬合剂剂量被认为是广泛代谢。

definition: to put poison in sth/to poison
to conspire to murder/to plot against sb's life
to kill secretly/to stab in the back
to kill/to cause death/to do sb to death
to entrap/to set up/to frame (up)/to make false charges against
to impute/to shift the blame onto someone else
to frame/to bring false charges against
an execution/to put sb to death
to assassinate/(military) to fight with a bayonet/(baseball) to put out (a baserunner)
to kill sb to prevent them from divulging a secret/to silence sb
